summary: The murder of the ex-wife of Dr. Sam Dennis Charney (Rutger Hauer) leads Detective Della Wilder (Pam Grier) to uncover a series of women's murders somehow linked to a big pharmaceutical company.
cast: Pam Grier|Rutger Hauer|Romano Orzari|John Dunn-Hill|Eugene Clark|Serge Houde|Richard Robitaille|Simone-Élise Girard|Frank Schorpion|Sasha Dominique|Linda E. Smith|Greg Kramer|Noel Burton|Robert Higden|Andrea Sadler|Abede Burke|Oheneba Burke|Sam Stone|Terry Simpson|Mike Tsar|Amanda Strawn|Manon Harvey|Anne Dryburgh|Jane Gilchrist|Jean-Marc Bisson|Gordon Masten|Stéfanie Buxton|Charlene Francique|John Walsh|Larry Day|B Martin Sage
title: Cómplices
